thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 4 of 176
thread.title: Liz Brindley

author: Liz Brindley
title: Liz Brindley
text:
I found Trusted Housesitters extremely good for both parties. The house owner gets a recommended personally chosen person to look after their house and pet. The sitter chooses a place for a break and the company of the pets. Great for both parties. All details are very well thought out and I received a good comprehensive list of everything I could possibly need to know. Highly recommend this service. Very fair fees too
Liz Brindley
